Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class MoveAndForceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.MapConvertible
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Action
        • it.polimi.ingsw.model.MoveAction
          • it.polimi.ingsw.model.MoveAndForceAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MoveAndForceAction
extends MoveAction
    represents the action of moving a worker, and in doing so causing an opponent's worker to change its position too, thereby forcing it
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveAndForceAction

        public MoveAndForceAction​(java.lang.String workerID,
                          int targetX,
                          int targetY,
                          Direction direction,
                          int startX,
                          int startY,
                          java.lang.String forcedWorkerId,
                          int forcedStartX,
                          int forcedStartY,
                          int forcedTargetX,
                          int forcedTargetY)
        constructs a complete MoveAndForceAction
        Parameters:
        workerID - a string that univocally represents a worker
        targetX - the x coordinate of the space on which the worker moves
        targetY - the y coordinate of the space on which the worker moves
        direction - the direction of the movement. Can be either up, down, or on the same level
        startX - the x coordinate of the starting space of the worker
        startY - the y coordinate of the starting space of the worker
        forcedWorkerId - a string that univocally represents the opponent's forced worker
        forcedStartX - the x coordinate of the space on which the opponent's forced worker moves
        forcedStartY - the y coordinate of the space on which the opponent's forced worker moves
        forcedTargetX - the x coordinate of the starting space of the opponent's forced worker
        forcedTargetY - the y coordinate of the starting space of the opponent's forced worker

      • MoveAndForceAction

        Parameters:
        moveAction - the MoveAction to decorate
        forcedWorkerId - a string that univocally represents the opponent's forced worker
        forcedStartX - the x coordinate of the space on which the opponent's forced worker moves
        forcedStartY - the y coordinate of the space on which the opponent's forced worker moves
        forcedTargetX - the x coordinate of the starting space of the opponent's forced worker
        forcedTargetY - the y coordinate of the starting space of the opponent's forced worker
